products.title: Disney Minnie Roller Blind
products.description: Liven up your childs bedroom with one of their disney roller blinds, 100% blackout to help ensure a great nights sleep, and in a range of classic prints that'll help make bedtime something to look forward to. As standard all of their blinds are child safe coming with a clear clip to hold the chain taught and agaisnt the wall so there are no free-hanging cords. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms where you need darkness to help give your child the best night sleep possible.

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create elegant shading in your window with the kingston cream pleated perfect fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your perfect fit frame to your upvc window for an integrated, cohesive look. The cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors.

products.title: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create a stunning statement piece out of your windows with kingston royal blue perfect fit. The richness of the colour makes this a balancing force in rooms with strongly coloured furnishings, while the dimout fabric still allows some lightflow during the daytime, for a gentle softening effect. The perfect fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space.

products.title: Kingston Flint Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: The kingston fabrics have a pebble-dash effect to them that creates an organic fabric that matches gorgeously with other organic materials and furnishings. Kingston flint's stone-grey tone is a dappling texture in a dimout style, allowing gentle light levels to pass through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.

products.title: Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Like all the kingston blinds, kingston black pleated perfect fit benefits from a pebble-dash effect across the fabric body that creates an organic texture. The dark black fabric is softened by this dappling texture, while the dimout style further enhances this effect by allowing gentle light levels to flow through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in flush against the window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.

products.title: Kingston Coco Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Discover the joys of a rich brown blind with the kingston coco pleated perfect fit. As with all perfect fits, the blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for simple tools-free installation. The chocolatey coco colouration is a must for rooms with plenty of dark wood, or homemakers looking for an 'unusual' neutral that breaks away from the classic monochromes.

products.title: Kingston Peach Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create soft warmth in your window with the kingston peach pleated perfect fit. This innovative blind style clips to the window frame itself rather than installing on the wall above, making it a quick and simple fit. Once in place the blind looks like an integrated part of your window, for a cohesive look. The peach hue is a little more informal than the more 'classic' neutrals, for relaxed interiors.
